mapper.select: select ord.orderdate as orderdate, ord.ordernum as ordernum, pro.productname as productname, pro.thumbimg as thumbimg, pro.productcontent as productcontent, det.orderprice as orderprice, det.orderstatus as orderstatus, del.invoice as invoice, pro.productnum from ordertbl ord join orderdetail det on ord.ordernum = det.ordernum join product pro on det.productnum = pro.productnum join delivery del on det.ordernum = del.ordernum where ord.userid=#{param1}
mapper.update: update orderdetail set orderstatus = '구매완료' where ordernum=#{param1}
select count(orderstatus) as orderstatus from orderdetail where orderstatus in('배송중', '배송완료') and ordernum = #{param1}
update orderdetail set orderstatus ='취소' where orderstatus not in('배송중', '배송완료') and ordernum = #{param1}
